title: Apple Pie
ingredients: Crust: 2½ cups flour, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp salt, 1 cup cold butter cubed, ½ cup ice water
Filling: 3 lbs mixed apples, ¾ cup sugar, 2 tbsp flour, 1 tsp cinnamon, ¼ tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp butter
1 egg + 1 tbsp water for egg wash
steps: Crust: Pulse flour, sugar, salt. Add butter, pulse to pea-sized. Drizzle ice water, pulse until dough forms. Divide, flatten, chill 1 hour.
Peel, core, slice apples. Toss with sugar, flour, spices.
Roll one disk to 12 inches. Fit into pie plate.
Roll second disk. Place over filling. Trim, crimp edges. Cut vents.
Brush with egg wash. Chill 30 minutes.
Bake at 425°F for 20 minutes. Reduce to 375°F, bake 40-50 more until golden and bubbling.
notes: Must cool or filling will run.
